demonstration_steps.title: Topic Selection Screen
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Large textarea with 'What would you like to learn about?' placeholder

demonstration_steps.title: Learning Preferences Screen
demonstration_steps.description: New screen asking 'How do you learn best?'
demonstration_steps.expected_state: 6 clickable preference boxes with emojis and descriptions
demonstration_steps.verification: Topic displayed, 'Select all that apply' instruction visible

demonstration_steps.title: Single Preference Selection
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Visual box changes to purple color with scale animation

demonstration_steps.title: Multiple Preference Selection
demonstration_steps.description: User adds Auditory and Hands-on preferences
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Multiple boxes selected with different colors (blue, orange)
demonstration_steps.verification: Each preference maintains distinct visual state

demonstration_steps.title: Deselection Test
demonstration_steps.description: User clicks Visual preference again to deselect
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Visual box returns to gray unselected state

demonstration_steps.title: Final Preference Selection
demonstration_steps.description: User selects Visual, Auditory, Hands-on, Reading/Writing
demonstration_steps.verification: All preferences have proper visual feedback

demonstration_steps.title: Navigation to Depth Selection
demonstration_steps.description: User clicks Next to proceed to depth selection
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Depth selection screen with learning preferences saved

demonstration_steps.title: AI Generation Integration
demonstration_steps.description: User completes flow triggering AI lesson plan generation
demonstration_steps.expected_state: Generating screen shows preferences are being used
demonstration_steps.verification: Preferences sent to OpenAI API for personalization

manual_testing_checklist: ✅ Click to select shows visual feedback
✅ Back button returns to topic selection

feature_validation.implementation: ✅ New LearningPreferences component with clickable preference boxes
feature_validation.integration: ✅ Integrated between topic and depth selection in user flow
feature_validation.functionality: ✅ Multi-select interface with proper state management
feature_validation.ai_integration: ✅ Preferences used to personalize OpenAI lesson generation
